title: trackedObjectSample
description: Universal time series sample for any tracked object type (bone, interactive, hand, etc.). Structural differences are defined only in metadata.

objectId.description: Globally unique identifier of the tracked object to which this sample belongs.

timestamp.description: Temporal identifier for this sample, using the MIND timestamp definition.

poseData.description: Complete 6-DOF pose of the tracked object, including position and rotation.

scale.description: Optional local scale of the object (applicable to interactive or deformable objects).

velocity.description: Optional linear velocity of the object in metres per second.

angularVelocity.description: Optional angular velocity of the object in radians per second.

extensions.description: Optional object for experiment- or device-specific additional fields.
